name: PAX_JOURNEY_LIST_STRUCTURE
description: Defines the structure of a 'PaxJourneyList' containing multiple 'PaxJourney' nodes. Each 'PaxJourney' includes a unique 'PaxJourneyID', a 'Duration', and a 'PaxSegmentRefID', representing a complete journey definition.
prompt: Verify that each <PaxJourney> in <PaxJourneyList> contains a unique <PaxJourneyID>, a valid <Duration> in ISO 8601 format, and a <PaxSegmentRefID> referencing a segment.
